job.title: REMOTE Software Developer/SDET
job.description: Software Developer/SDET 100% Remote $80k - $130k Top Reasons to Work with Us  Based in North Austin, TX, we are a leading Real Estate Fintech company helping residential investors grow their portfolios with our innovative technology and streamlined process offerings. Currently, we are looking to bring on a Software Developer/SDET. If you would like to be a pivotal part of our QA team and help mature our automation, frameworks, and tools, we would love the time to tell you more about this amazing opportunity! If you are looking for your next incredible challenge that not only will help your skills develop but will help your career move up, this is the place for you! What You Need for this Position  As the Software Developer/SDET, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing and documenting code for a growing, well-established and reputable Financial Services Technology Organization!  What's In It for You So, if you are a Software Developer with SDET experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Katherine.Krull@CyberCoders.com Katherine Krull - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
